Room.Name: Ruby Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the eastern end of the Wizard's Eye ruby hallway.
Room.LongDescription: Now that you know something of your craft, you are hereby charged with the duty of helping those below you who also aspire to become a mage. As you become older and wiser, the young mages will look to you for guidance. Be sure it is not lacking on your part.
